chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is experiencing the following issue:
Camera focusing dysfunction. Blurry images and videos.
Thank you for your help,

Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or electrical appliance) to replace or repair your product. Alternatively, they have 2 business days to process a refund (if eligible). 
A return is considered complete when the customer confirms that:
✔ The product has not been repaired by a third party and has not sustained any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Personal data has been deleted.
✔ They have confirmed they have the return label.
✔ They understand that they must include accessories and proof of purchase in their package.
✔ They have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or electrical appliance) to replace or repair your product. Alternatively, they have 2 business days to process a refund (if eligible).

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer.

Regards,
CH
